docs.text: LOOΠΔ ¶ LOONA (stylized as LOOΠΔ ) is a South Korean girl group formed by Blockberry Creative. They debuted on 20 August 2018 with the extended play [+ +]. Its twelve members were revealed in a periodic fashion, corresponding to their Korean name Idarui Sonyeo (이달의 소녀), which translates to “Girl of the Month”. Pre-debut Project ¶ Beginning in 2016, Blockberry Creative released 12 single albums, one for each member of the group. Each single album typically consists of a solo track and another track performed with other revealed members. These single albums are namely: HeeJin (Sep 2016) HyunJin (Oct 2016) HaSeul (Dec 2016) YeoJin (Jan 2017) ViVi (Apr 2017) Kim Lip (May 2017) JinSoul (Jun 2017) Choerry (Jul 2017) Yves (Nov 2017) Chuu (Dec 2017) Go Won (Jan 2018) Olivia Hye (Mar 2018)
